attributes.action: Lower bills so people can afford them.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government of parliament to lower bills because then families without any money will be able to pay the bills and buy food.
attributes.background: I make this petition because bills have gone up to much and people who don’t have enough money will pay the bills and then they won’t have any money to buy food.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Bills are a matter for consumers and providers, rather than the UK Government or Parliament to set.
